auth.intro: Join our community to explore and contribute to the world's cultural symbols

about.title: About the Community
about.description: Join our growing community of cultural explorers documenting the world's symbolic heritage.

profile.noContributions: You haven't made any contributions yet.
profile.settingsDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences

hero.heading: Discover the Language of Cultural Symbols
hero.subheading: Explore, interpret and preserve the visual cultural heritage from around the world

sections.newsletterSub: Stay updated with the latest discoveries and cultural symbols

howItWorks.intro: Learn how our platform helps document and preserve cultural symbols

1.title: Upload & Identify
1.desc: Upload images of cultural motifs you encounter for identification

2.title: Tag & Annotate
2.desc: Add tags, geographical context and cultural details to enrich the database

3.title: Discover Connections
3.desc: Explore the relationships between similar symbols across different cultures

4.title: Create & Reuse
4.desc: Use the symbols as inspiration for your own creative projects

contributions.title: My Contributions
contributions.emptyDescription: You haven't submitted any contributions yet. Start by creating a new one.
contributions.list: List of your contributions to the Symbolica project

form.title: New Contribution
form.subtitle: Share a new symbol or motif with the Symbolica community

fields.title: Title

sections.generalDescription: Essential details about the pattern or symbol

sections.locationDescription: Where did you find this symbol or pattern?

validation.imageRequired: An image is required for the contribution

map.placeholderSub: For the prototype, please enter the place name directly

image.drop: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select

errors.format: The file must be an image (JPEG, PNG, etc.)

detail.notFoundDescription: This contribution does not exist or has been deleted.
detail.accessDeniedDescription: You do not have the necessary permissions to view this contribution.
detail.pendingReviewDescription: This contribution is being reviewed by our moderators.

admin.title: Contributions Management
admin.subtitle: Manage contributions submitted by users
admin.accessRestrictedDescription: You must be an administrator to access this page.

toast.contributionDescription: Your contribution has been saved and will be reviewed soon.
toast.statusUpdateSuccess: The contribution status has been updated.

uploadTools.title: Symbol Upload Tools
uploadTools.subtitle: Discover our AI-powered tools for identifying and analyzing cultural patterns and symbols

capture.title: Capture and Upload
capture.desc: Easily capture images of symbols and patterns you encounter in your travels or daily life

analyze.title: Automatic Analysis
analyze.desc: Our AI algorithms automatically detect and extract patterns from your images

share.title: Share and Connect
share.desc: Connect your findings with the global community and contribute to cultural preservation

process.title: Symbol Processing
process.subtitle: See how our AI transforms your uploads

symbolTriptych.empty: Select a symbol from the list to view details
symbolTriptych.errorDesc: There was a problem loading this symbol. Please try again later.
symbolTriptych.imageErrorDesc: We're having trouble loading some images. Please try again later.

testimonials.title: User Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Discover how Symbolica transforms the way experts and enthusiasts interact with cultural symbols

callToAction.description: Be part of a growing network of cultural enthusiasts documenting the world's symbolic heritage.
callToAction.support: We support cultural institutions and independent researchers alike.

mapping.title: Cultural Mapping
mapping.description: Explore geolocated symbols across different cultures and eras with our intuitive navigation interface.

identification.title: Advanced Identification
identification.description: Our analysis technology identifies, classifies and contextualizes cultural symbols with precision.

documentation.title: Collaborative Documentation
documentation.description: Contribute to enrich the global knowledge base of heritage symbols shared by our community.

community.title: Our community of enthusiasts
community.description: Join thousands of heritage enthusiasts and experts around the world, share your discoveries and find your thematic community

thematicCommunities.title: Thematic Communities
thematicCommunities.description: Join specialized groups based on your interests: Art Deco, Medieval Symbolism, Asian Patterns...

personalSpace.title: Your Personal Space
personalSpace.description: Save your discoveries, track your contributions and visualize your expertise progression

intuitiveNavigation.title: Intuitive Navigation
intuitiveNavigation.description: Explore connections between symbols, places and cultures with our 'mind mapping' navigation

footer.tagline: Exploring and preserving the world's symbolic heritage together.
